issue.title: [Go] offset not used when accessing binary array
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4130](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4130). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When accessing a binary array, the offset of the underlying data buffer is not used. This affects the behavior of slicing. See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/3270> .
